title: Would you be for or against Riot working on their servers in exchange for gameplay updates?
body: I'm just curious if I'm the only one with this opinion. I feel like the ping we get in NA is so atrocious compared to what other regions get. Personally, i wouldn't mind waiting 2 or even 3 years without champions for Riot to fix their servers. I don't know, just my opinion.

replies.body: The greatest/most common source of increased latency is distance to the server; regions that tend to have a comparatively low ping on average are just smaller so the players are all closer to the server they play on. Literally nothing can be done about this.

alot of that isnt riots fault its the infrastructure in america. if you are comparing to korea /china they just have better infrastructure for internet .

and i have a steady 44ms on my games connected via wifi
